sentences.sContent: But what if the avalanche happened?
sentences.sCn: 不过，要是发生雪崩怎么办呢？

sentences.sContent: If the value was much lower than one, on the other hand, the avalanche would soon die out.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the value was much lower than one, on the other hand, the avalanche would soon die out.
sentences.sCn: 另一方面，如果结果是一个比一小很多的数字，那么雪崩很快就会停止。

trans.tranOther: a large mass of snow, ice, and rocks that falls down the side of a mountain
